name: Frog Helper
description:
Description

Frog Helper is a short 2D platformer puzzle sandbox game where you take control of a program in the form of a frog. Explore a computer desktop and solve puzzles with the use of your sticky froggy tongue and find out what's really going on behind the curtain!

Main Features
  • Fun tongue physics platformer
  • Computer Exploration like never before
  • An annoying disembodied talking window
  • A room that contains a ball with an unbelievable amount of bounciness!!
Credits:

School of Innovation and Creation Technologies (ETIC)
